00063   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListLocalAccOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00064   {
00065      std::string sqlListofLocalAccountInitial = sqlRequest;
00066 
00067      size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00068      size_t machineIdSize = options->getMachineId().size();
00069      bool isListAll = options->isAdminListOption();
00070 
00071      if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && (userIdSize!=0 || isListAll)) {
00072         UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00073         throw e;
00074      }
00075 
00076      if(!isListAll) {
00077         addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00078      }
00079      //The admin option
00080      if(userIdSize!=0) {
00081         //To check if the user id is correct
00082         checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00083 
00084         sqlRequest=sqlListofLocalAccountInitial;
00085         addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00086      }
00087 
00088      if(machineIdSize!=0) {
00089         //To check if the machine id is correct
00090         checkMachineId(options->getMachineId());
00091 
00092         if(!isListAll && userIdSize==0) {
00093           sqlRequest=sqlListofLocalAccountInitial;
00094           addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00095         }
00096         addOptionRequest("machineid", options->getMachineId(), sqlRequest);
00097      }
00098 
00099   }

00107   UMS_Data::ListLocalAccounts* list()
00108   {
00109     DatabaseResult *ListofLocalAccount;
00110     std::string sqlListofLocalAccount = "SELECT machineid, userid, aclogin, sshpathkey, home "
00111     "from account, machine, users where account.machine_nummachineid=machine.nummachineid and "
00112     "account.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";
00113 
00114     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00115     std::vector<std::string> results;
00116     UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00117     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListLocalAccounts();
00118 
00119 
00120     //Creation of the object user
00121     UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00122     userServer.init();
00123     //if the user exists
00124     if (userServer.exist()) {
00125 
00126       //To process options
00127       processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListofLocalAccount);
00128 
00129       ListofLocalAccount = mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListofLocalAccount.c_str());
00130       if (ListofLocalAccount->getNbTuples() != 0){
00131         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListofLocalAccount->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00132           results.clear();
00133           results = ListofLocalAccount->get(i);
00134           ii = results.begin();
00135 
00136           UMS_Data::LocalAccount_ptr localAccount = ecoreFactory->createLocalAccount();
00137           localAccount->setMachineId(*ii);
00138           localAccount->setUserId(*(++ii));
00139           localAccount->setAcLogin(*(++ii));
00140           localAccount->setSshKeyPath(*(++ii));
00141           localAccount->setHomeDirectory(*(++ii));
00142 
00143           mlistObject->getAccounts().push_back(localAccount);
00144         }
00145       }
00146     }
00147     else {
00148       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00149       throw e;
00150     }
00151     return mlistObject;
00152   }
